results.name: Compound filter (2-adic valuation & sum of the divisors): a(n) = P(A001511(n), A000203(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: from sympy import divisor_sigma as D
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)//2
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 12 2017
xref: Cf. A000593, A146076 (sequences matching to this filter), also A000203, A161942, A286260, A286357.
